程序包 Model

类 Player

java.lang.Object
Model.Player
直接已知子类:
Bot
public class Player extends Object
Player encapsulates the operations of players.
作者:
SUN Sun, ZHANG Xiao
另请参阅:

    • beAccused

      public void beAccused(Game game)
      When this player is accused by another player, he performs a series of actions.

      This player can choose to reveal identity card or use Witch? effect of a card.

      参数:
      game - reference of Game

    • haveBroomstick

      public boolean haveBroomstick()
      Judges if this player has a Broomstick in his hand.
      返回:
      true if this player has a Broomstick, false otherwise

      返回:

    • existRevealedCard

      public boolean existRevealedCard(RumourCardName cardName)
      Judges if this player has any revealed Rumour card.
      参数:
      cardName - RumourCardName
      返回:
      true if this player has a revealed Rumour card, false otherwise

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn(Game game)
      In this player's turn, he performs a series of actions.

      This player can choose to accuse another player of being witch or use Hunt! effect of a Rumour card.

      参数:
      game - reference of Game
